p: The evolutionary rates of the VP1 and RdRp regions of the GII.P17-GII.17 strains are presented in Table 1. The rate for the VP1 region was 2.7 × 10 −3 substitutions/site/year (95% HPD 2.2–3.2 × 10 −3), while that for the RdRp region was 2.3 × 10 −3 (95% HPD 1.5–3.2 × 10 −3). These results indicate that the VP1 and RdRp regions of the GII.P17-GII.17 strains evolved with similar rates.
